original_text: And again he sent unto them another servant; and at him they cast stones, and wounded him in the head, and sent him away shamefully handled.
korean_text: 다시 다른 종을 보내니 그의 머리에 상처를 내고 능욕하였거늘

sentences.original_text: And again he sent unto them another servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 또 다른 종을 보내었고

sentences.original_text: and at him they cast stones
and wounded him in the head
and sent him away shamefully handled
